org.workflowsim.clustering.balancing

Class BalancedClustering

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.workflowsim.clustering.BasicClustering
      • org.workflowsim.clustering.balancing.BalancedClustering
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusteringInterface

    public class BalancedClustering
extends BasicClustering
    BalancedClustering is a clustering method that aims balancing task runtime and data dependency. All BalancedClustering methods should extend it
    Since:
    WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
